prompts: Create a majestic fire-type Pokemon that gallops with flames trailing behind it.
I want a swift Pokemon with a fiery mane and a sleek, equine body.
Generate an elegant creature resembling a horse, adorned in bright flames.
Make a dynamic Pokemon that embodies the spirit of fire and speed.
Imagine a powerful fire-type Pokemon, with a golden body and a mane of flames.
Design a Pokemon that roams the grasslands, leaving a trail of fire in its wake.
Show me a Pokemon that combines grace and ferocity, with a fiery tail and hooves.
